attributes.additional_details: The great British pub is getting further into decline.  Bring back at least one room in a pub where the right to smoke is again accepted. Smoking is not illegal !  It is absurd that you can smoke on ship in an enclosed room but not on dry land.  You can even smoke in a designated space in airports in the EU but not in the UK - this is wrong.

rejection.details: Please see petition "Amend the smoking ban".
